creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: white, red, green; royal blue satin base completely covered with appliqued floral and leaf designs using sequins; small, round, white braid in curly designs; yellow and white metal outlines designs; multicolored sequins; "horns" on either side with fringe; red on one side, yellow on the other; stiff, crown-like piece in front; back tapers down to a point (helmet shape?); very similar to 2004.67.370; quilted lining
title: Child's Hat
